text: Heya, yeh im also sorry I've also been MIA, I hope your well and in good health in pur current situation hope you work flow hasn't been affected heavily and hope all your work goes well! My uni has also gone for work from home with digital lectures and emails/calls so I've been doing work from home. And thanks I thought about it after a director was planning to bring back James Dean in a supporting role and am planning to base it around Bruce Lee as his image has been used alot.
